= `static` Class *jplex.components.calendar.CalendarItem*  =

== Description ==
Item representing one cell of the calendar (i.e. one day)
Store the corresponding HTML element and date and handle focus and select events.






== Methods ==
<table border="1" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="5">                                
<tr><td> *Signature* </td><td> *Return Type* </td><td> *Description* </td></tr>
<tr><td> `check()` </td><td> `bool` </td><td> Check whether the date of the item match a valid date or not
(regarding to the valid range set in the calendar configuration)<br /> </td></tr>
<tr><td> `focus()` </td><td> `void` </td><td> Set the focus on the item<br /> </td></tr>
<tr><td> `getCell()` </td><td> `Element` </td><td> Get the cell (td) element representing the item<br /> </td></tr>
<tr><td> `getDate()` </td><td> `Date` </td><td> Get the date of the item<br /> </td></tr>
<tr><td> `getIndex()` </td><td> `Integer` </td><td> Get the index of the item in the table<br /> </td></tr>
<tr><td> `select(e, click)` </td><td> `void` </td><td> Selects the date corresponding to the item<br />  - `e <Event>`<br/> - `click <bool>` true if the selection results from a click on the cell<br/></td></tr>

</table>
